title: Benihana offers teppanyaki dining where chefs cook at customer tables
statement: At Benihana, skilled chefs cook fresh ingredients on a sizzling grill right at customers' tables as part of the teppanyaki experience.

citations.quote: At Benihana, dining is more than a meal â€” it's a teppanyaki experience where skilled chefs cook fresh ingredients on a sizzling grill right at your table.
